member.name: QACONTAINER.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.summary: The number of ambient properties supplied by the container using values from the enumeration.

member.name: QACONTAINER.hpal
member.summary: Specifies Palette, an ambient property supplied by the container with a DISPID = -726.
